<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get Automated Timers from a system

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"systemId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"String Id of the system"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"exists":{"type":"boolean"},"id":{"description":"Reminder Id","type":"string"},"content":{"description":"The reminder itself","type":"object","properties":{"name":{"description":"Name of the reminder","type":"string"},"message":{"description":"Message of the reminder","type":"string"},"action":{"description":"unknwon","type":"integer"},"delayInHours":{"description":"Delay In Hours from action to reminder","type":"string"},"type":{"description":"When this reminder should trigger. 0 -> Member front change, 1 -> Custom front change, 2 -> Any front change","type":"integer"},"uid":{"description":"The system ID","type":"string"},"lastOperationTime":{"description":"Time in milliseconds since epoch of the last operation on this obejct","type":"string"}},"title":"automatedTimer"}},"title":"automatedTimerContainer"}}}}},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
